seo.title: Alexandria Campus | Senghor University
seo.description: Discover the headquarters of Senghor University in Alexandria, Egypt: modern facilities, library, accommodation and exceptional living environment.

hero.title: Our Alexandria Headquarters
hero.subtitle: A historic campus in the heart of the Mediterranean, offering an environment of excellence for training future African leaders

presentation.title: The Campus
presentation.description: Senghor University occupies a magnificent historic building in the heart of Alexandria, just steps from the famous Bibliotheca Alexandrina. This exceptional site provides an environment conducive to study and personal growth, combining architectural heritage with modern infrastructure.
presentation.address: 1 Ahmed Orabi Square, El Mancheya, Alexandria, Egypt

location.title: Find Us
location.subtitle: Located in the heart of Alexandria, near the Mediterranean
location.addressValue: 1 Ahmed Orabi Square, El Mancheya, Alexandria, Egypt

cta.title: Visit Our Campus
cta.description: Discover our facilities and meet our team. We look forward to welcoming you.
